text:
The real-time toggle controls when translations happen:

**Real-time ON** (default):
- Translations happen automatically as you type
- Uses a 800ms debounce delay (waits for you to stop typing)
- More convenient for quick translations

**Real-time OFF**:
- Translations only happen when you click the "Translate" button
- Gives users full control over when to translate
- Better for longer texts or when you want to finish writing first

This gives users flexibility - some prefer instant feedback while typing, others prefer to complete their text before translating. It's a UX enhancement that DeepL doesn't offer.

Would you like me to adjust the debounce timing or change how this feature works?
